page.title: 13HOCKWORTHY FETE
page.content: EVERY OTHER YEAR AT HOCKWORTHY THERE IS A FETE.IN THE YEAR 1985 THE STALL HOLDERS DRESSED UP IN VICTORIAN CLOTHES.THEY HAD LOTS OF OLD FASHIONED GAMES AND ACTIVITIES LIKE SELLING LAVENDER BAGS AND SKITTLES.THEY ALWAYS HAVE REFRESHMENTS AND PLACES TO SIT THAT FACE THE GREEN.IN 1985 THEY HAD MAYPOLE DANCING AND COUNTRY DANCING BY HOLCOMBE AND BURLESCOMBE SCHOOLS.IN THE VILLAGE OF HOLCOMBE ROGUS THEY HAVE A SET OF HANDBELLS THAT ARE USED FOR CLUBS AND FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS LIKE HOCKWORTHY FETE.THEY HAD A BOTTLE STALL AND THEY HAVE STALLS SELLING JUMBLE THEY ALSO HAVE DRAWS.THEY HAD A LUCKY DIP AND A NAME THE DOLL CONTEST.
